post:
Hi all,

we from [Nodion](https://www.nodion.com/en/) currently have some limited special deals that are worth taking a look at!
  
  
**All offers, limited special or not, include the following:**

  * Based on rack servers with E3 or E5 CPU, ECC RAM and pure SSD storage
  * 15 second deployment: Don’t wait for manual setup, sign up and get started within 15 seconds!
  * KVM Virtualization
  * 500 Gbit/s DDoS Protection: All incoming traffic is routed through Voxility famous Anti DDoS protection
  * 100 % Uptime SLA: Server down? You don’t have to pay anything during that time
  * Prime Location: Frankfurt, DE. We are only meters away from the biggest internet exchange of the world
  * 24/7/365 Support
  
  
  
# **[SPECIAL 2220115](https://www.nodion.com/en/)**

  * 2 GB ECC RAM
  * 2x 3.5 GHz vCPU Cores
  * 20 GB Pure SSD
  * 1 TB Traffic @ 1 Gbps
  * 5 EUR / Month
  * [SIGN UP AND ORDER](https://www.nodion.com/en/)



Pricing in EUR. Excludes any applicable tax. Billed per month. 
Additional traffic is charged at 0,02 EUR / GB.

These are limited time offers and available only while stock lasts.


Chat with us:  
https://www.nodion.com/en/ (bottom right corner)

hi@nodion.com
